sentence: For any that may see this post thank you and love from all the girls of the Rocky Horror Bachelorette Surprise Party from Room 1212
Modern hotel with nice large rooms and large bathrooms
The room was spotlessly clean everything in the bathroom worked and it had the most powerful shower I have experienced in any hotel EVER
The room was perfect and very roomy especially for the city
Great locale near but not on top off times square and again the quality of the buildings and furnishings and the level of professionalism and service will drive us back here next time
We were able to sleep in relax and enjoyed our time in the room
As always with Kimpton properties the rooms are well appointed elegant but with a funky twist and clean
The staff acknowledged Moms birthday from the check in and Brenda very kindly left us cupcakes and a bottle of wine to celebrate in our room
Spent three nights at the Kimpton Muse and was impressed by the friendliness of staff the care for the property the comfort of the room and its excellent bathroom
The king bed was very comfy and the shower was huge with a rain shower head and a hand held
There is free coffee in the lobby no machines in the rooms
It was in a basement room and looked acceptable nothing more
So I just turned off the system as I did not want an engineering working in my room in the middle of the night
Room key was deactivated several times
The front desk staff provided a unauthorized person with a key to my room
Upon check in there were no bath towels due to a late delivery from the hotels linen service
Then my room 410 has so limited light which forces me to put up the room lights all day long
Why ask how many people in the room if you are not going to provide the correct number of towels etc
If you are lucky enough to book a room with a balcony and the balconies are massive
Seemed room temp not under our control uncomfortably warm at night
